ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the other number field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Other_Number__c ) && NOT(ISNULL(Other_Number__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Other_Number__c )) && !REGEX(Other_Number__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Other_Number__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Other_Number__c )) && !REGEX(Other_Number__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for other number. The minimum number of digits should be 10
